arts.ttl: Twente slump to poor loss at home to USG
arts.sum: FC Twente are still waiting for their first Europa League win after a 1-0 loss at home to Union Sint-Gilles. Joseph Oosting decided to start without Sam Lammers while Bart van Rooij was suspended. Ricky van Wolfswinkel was preferred up front. The Belgian visitors were immediately threatening on the counter and they had a goal […] The post Twente slump to poor loss at home to USG appeared first on Football Oranje.

arts.ttl: FC Twente v Union St Gilloise Preview | Two sides in desperate need of three Europa League points meet in Enschede
arts.sum: Both FC Twente and Union St Gilloise could do with three points when the sides meet on Thursday. Both sides are winless in this years Europa League competition, and with…

arts.ttl: ‘FC Twente may lose Steijn: top scorer on the radar of many clubs’
arts.sum: There is a possibility that Sem Steijn is playing his last season for FC Twente, according to De Telegraaf (via Voetbal Primeur).

arts.ttl: Preview: FC Twente vs. Union SG - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Thursday's Europa League clash between FC Twente and Union SG, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
